main.name: Jitender Singh
main.description: With a background in business managment and software developement. I like things many humans like such as coffee, travel, gym, and marvel movies! Good food and funny jokes are always a plus
main.bio: I have progressive experience and knowledge across multiple domains. Self-starter, highly analytical, team-player, with advanced software engineering and project management skills. Looking to grow my experience while wearing multiple hats within the organization.

work.title: Loan Service Specialist
work.description: Reviewed Deferred Fee, New Loan, Ad hoc Welcome letter, Billing Exceptions, Ground Rent, and Interest Adjustments reports daily and escalating potential issues for resolution. In charge of running a daily Loan to Board Report to confirm turnaround time for RECM, Warehouse and securitized loans. Monitored and processed transactions such as property address changes, hold code/vip code, parcel release, ground lease letters and securitization letter.

work.title: Junior Business Analyst
work.description: Managed an IT security project from inception through completion to enhance cyber security. Successfully guided cross-functional teams and stakeholder groups through complex assessments. Evaluated information gathered from multiple sources, identified gaps, and translated business requirements into system solutions. Developed project plans, milestones, and schedules using MS Project.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

testimonials.text: I worked with Jitender at well's fargo for a year. He always got his work done on time and always willing to help others.
